div.p: All prescribable medication formulations represented using either a 'generic' or 'brand-specific' concept. This includes RxNorm codes whose Term Type is SCD (semantic clinical drug), SBD (semantic brand drug), GPCK (generic pack), BPCK (brand pack), SCDG (semantic clinical drug group), SBDG (semantic brand drug group), SCDF (semantic clinical drug form), or SBDF (semantic brand drug form)
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm where TTY in SCD,SBD,GPCK,BPCK,SCDG,SBDG,SCDF,SBDF
